history: TTS !b Welcome to CMU Get Going. <break strength='strong'/> Your conversation will be recorded securely in order to help researchers improve voice-based assistants but your phone number will not be shared. <break strength='strong'/> By voluntarily continuing you confirm that you are 18 or older. <break time='1s'/> </speak>
TTS <speak> How would you like to travel today? <break strength='strong'/> I can give you public transit directions or driving directions. </speak>
USER public transit
TTS <speak> Great! <break strength='strong' /> I will provide you with directions to your destination by public transit. <break time='800ms'/> </speak>
TTS Where are you going?
USER Ellsworth in Max Glee
TTS Where do you want to go?
USER Ellsworth and Negley
TTS Did you say that you wanted to go to ellsworth avenue and south negley avenue?
USER Yes.
TTS Where do you want to leave from?
USER CMU
TTS Did you say that you were leaving from carnegie mellon university?
USER Yes.
TTS When do you want to travel
USER 5 P.M.
TTS Okay, travelling at 05:00 pm.
TTS <speak> Would you like me to pause after every step to give you time to write things down? </speak>
USER No.
TTS <speak> Sounds good. <break strength='strong' /> Let me know if you didn't understand a step, and I'll repeat it for you. </speak>
TTS <speak> Hold on. I'll look up the directions. </speak>
USER yes

TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> There are 4 available routes, to hear a different route say ALTERNATE ROUTE. The amount of time your trip will take is approximately 12 minutes, and you will take 1 bus.<break time='800ms'/> The first thing that you want to do <break strength='weak'/> is to Walk for about 9 mins to <break strength='weak'/> <prosody volume='loud'> Neville St at Ellsworth avenue near side. </prosody> </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Shall I move onto the next step? </speak>
USER Yes.

TTS <speak> The final step <break strength='weak'/> is to Take the <break strength='weak'/> <prosody volume='loud'> 75 <break strength='weak'/> to </prosody> <break strength='weak'/> <prosody volume='loud'> Ellsworth avenue at Negley avenue.</prosody> It will depart at <break strength='weak'/> <prosody volume='loud'> 5:15pm. </prosody> </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Did you understand this step? </speak>
USER Yes.
TTS <speak> </speak>
TTS <speak> Would you like to hear an alternate route?</speak>
USER No.
TTS <speak> Were the provided directions useful? </speak>
USER Yep.
TTS <speak> Would you use GetGoing again? </speak>
